characteristics.name: Writing Style
characteristics.description: Consistently appears in their content as concise and clear, making it easy to understand and engage with.

options.description: Clearly conveys thoughts without unnecessary elaboration
Takes time to consider and articulate opinions

characteristics.name: Analytical Approach
characteristics.description: Often presents data-driven insights, demonstrating a thorough understanding of topics.

options.description: Makes decisions based on empirical evidence
Trusts instincts and experience to inform decisions

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: Engages with others in a collaborative and inclusive manner, valuing diverse perspectives.

options.description: Seeks to build consensus and work towards shared goals
Focuses on individual achievement and success

characteristics.name: Creativity
characteristics.description: Demonstrates innovative thinking, exploring new ideas and approaches to problems.

options.description: Adjusts to changing circumstances with ease

characteristics.name: Learning Approach
characteristics.description: Embraces continuous learning, seeking out new knowledge and experiences.

options.description: Seeks to learn more about topics of interest
Focuses on applying existing knowledge in practical ways

characteristics.name: Confidence Level
characteristics.description: Exudes self-assurance, taking calculated risks and standing by convictions.

options.description: Seeks to assert authority and expertise

characteristics.name: Pacing
characteristics.description: Manages time effectively, balancing speed and deliberation in their communication.

options.description: Moves quickly through ideas and topics
Takes time to fully consider and articulate thoughts

characteristics.name: Goal-Oriented
characteristics.description: Clearly articulates and works towards personal and professional objectives.

options.description: Strives for excellence in all endeavors
Settles for achievable goals rather than striving for perfection
